Class EnemyBullet

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Bullet
        • EnemyBullet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HomingBullet

    public class EnemyBullet
extends Bullet
    This Class can be used to create EnemyBullet objects
    Author:
    elan

    • Constructor Detail

      • EnemyBullet

        public EnemyBullet(Entity enemy,
           int index)
        Cunstructor for the EnemyBullet object
        Parameters:
        enemy - Bullet will be created with same x, y, and angle as this entity
        index - Give the EnemyBullet a unique index to identify it

      • EnemyBullet

        public EnemyBullet(Entity enemy,
           int index,
           double a)
        Cunstructor for the EnemyBullet object
        Parameters:
        enemy - Bullet will be created with same x, y, and angle as this entity
        index - Give the EnemyBullet a unique index to identify it
        angleDeviation - this angle will be added to the entity's angle and the bullet will be created with the resulting angle
